description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，出身建筑工人，曾任北京市人民政府副市长、中华人民共和国国家建设委员会副主任。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who started as a construction worker and later served as Vice Mayor of the Beijing Municipal People's Government and Vice Minister of the State Construction Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省，是张百发的出生地。
description.en: Located in Hebei province, it is the birthplace of Zhang Bafa.

description.zh-cn: 北京市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Beijing.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家建设委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家建设委员会
en: State Construction Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责国家建设工作。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national construction.

nodes.id: 北京市第三建筑工程公司

zh-cn: 北京市第三建筑工程公司

description.zh-cn: 张百发早期工作的单位，承建了北京地质学院、北京航空学院等工程。
description.en: The company where Zhang Bafa worked in his early years, which undertook projects such as the Beijing Institute of Geology and the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics.

nodes.id: 张百发钢筋工青年突击队

zh-cn: 张百发钢筋工青年突击队
张百发钢筋工青年小组
en: Zhang Bafa Rebar Worker Youth Shock Brigade

description.zh-cn: 由张百发担任队长的青年建筑工人突击队，在北京的建设中，尤其是在人民大会堂的建设中，发挥了重要作用。
description.en: A youth construction worker shock brigade led by Zhang Bafa, which played a significant role in the construction of Beijing, especially in the construction of the Great Hall of the People.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，与张百发同为青年突击队长出身的领导人。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who, like Zhang Bafa, rose from being a youth shock brigade leader.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市副市长，在文革期间受到冲击。他关心并支持了张百发、李瑞环等工人的成长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China and former Vice Mayor of Beijing who was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution. He cared for and supported the growth of workers like Zhang Bafa and Li Ruihuan.

description.zh-cn: 一场在中华人民共和国发生的政治运动，期间万里、张百发、李瑞环等人都受到了冲击。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China during which figures like Wan Li, Zhang Bafa, and Li Ruihuan were impacted.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的著名掏粪工人、劳动模范，在文革期间与张百发、李瑞环一同被批斗。
description.en: A famous night soil collector and model worker in the People's Republic of China, who was publicly denounced along with Zhang Bafa and Li Ruihuan during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一所著名综合性研究型大学，张百发曾在此函授学习。
description.en: A prestigious comprehensive research university located in Beijing, where Zhang Bafa studied through a correspondence course.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二代中央领导集体的核心，曾多次接见张百发并视察其负责的北京城建项目。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the People's Republic of China. He met with Zhang Bafa on multiple occasions and inspected Beijing's urban construction projects overseen by him.

description.zh-cn: 1990年在北京举办的亚洲运动会，张百发担任亚运工程总指挥。
description.en: The Asian Games held in Beijing in 1990, for which Zhang Bafa served as the commander-in-chief of the construction projects.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治风波，事件后发达国家的制裁给北京亚运会的筹备工作带来了困难。
description.en: A political turmoil that occurred in Beijing, China in 1989. The subsequent sanctions from developed countries caused difficulties for the preparations of the Beijing Asian Games.

description.zh-cn: 张百发的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Zhang Bafa.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市市长，是张百发担任副市长时的直接上级。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China who served as the Mayor of Beijing and was the direct superior of Zhang Bafa when he was Vice Mayor.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京天安门广场西侧的建筑，是全国人民代表大会开会和党和国家领导人举行政治、外交活动的场所。张百发钢筋工青年突击队参与了其建设。
description.en: A building located on the west side of Tiananmen Square in Beijing, serving as the venue for the National People's Congress and for political and diplomatic activities of Party and state leaders. The Zhang Bafa Rebar Worker Youth Shock Brigade participated in its construction.

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国政治权力顶层人物的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the top figures in the political power structure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家，曾为张百发画像。
description.en: A Chinese painter who once created a portrait of Zhang Bafa.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、散文家和诗人，曾为蒋兆和所作的张百发画像题词。
description.en: A Chinese historian, essayist, and poet who wrote an inscription on the portrait of Zhang Bafa painted by Jiang Zhaohe.

description.zh-cn: 张百发出生于河北香河的一个贫苦农民家庭。
description.en: Zhang Bafa was born into a poor peasant family in Xianghe, Hebei.

relationships.target: 张百发钢筋工青年突击队

description.zh-cn: 张百发是“张百发钢筋工青年小组”的12名组建者之一，并被任命为队长，该小组后被正式命名为“张百发钢筋工青年突击队”。
description.en: Zhang Bafa was one of the 12 founders of the 'Zhang Bafa Rebar Worker Youth Group' and was appointed as its leader. The group was later officially named the 'Zhang Bafa Rebar Worker Youth Shock Brigade'.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，张百发加入中国共产党。
description.en: In 1954, Zhang Bafa joined the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 张百发钢筋工青年突击队

description.zh-cn: 张百发钢筋工青年突击队参与了人民大会堂的建设，仅用9个昼夜便完成了人大常委会办公楼工程的基础钢筋绑扎，极大地推进了整体施工进度。
description.en: The Zhang Bafa Rebar Worker Youth Shock Brigade participated in the construction of the Great Hall of the People, completing the rebar tying for the foundation of the Standing Committee office building in just 9 days and nights, significantly advancing the overall construction progress.

description.zh-cn: 1959年，张百发在全国群英会上受到党和国家领导人接见。
description.en: In 1959, Zhang Bafa was received by Party and state leaders at the National Conference of Heroes.

description.zh-cn: 画家蒋兆和曾为张百发画像。
description.en: The painter Jiang Zhaohe once created a portrait of Zhang Bafa.

description.zh-cn: 邓拓在蒋兆和为张百发所作的画像上题词：“百尺竿头多面手，人民英雄张百发。”
description.en: Deng Tuo inscribed on the portrait of Zhang Bafa painted by Jiang Zhaohe: 'A versatile hand at the top of the pole, a hero of the people, Zhang Bafa.'

description.zh-cn: 时任北京市副市长的万里主管城市建设，张百发是其手下得力干将，其成长得到了万里的关心。
description.en: Wan Li, then Vice Mayor of Beijing in charge of urban construction, considered Zhang Bafa one of his most capable subordinates and cared about his development.

description.zh-cn: 时任北京市副市长的万里主管城市建设，李瑞环是其手下得力干将，其成长得到了万里的关心。
description.en: Wan Li, then Vice Mayor of Beijing in charge of urban construction, considered Li Ruihuan one of his most capable subordinates and cared about his development.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，万里被打成“走资派”并遭到批斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wan Li was labeled a 'capitalist roader' and subjected to struggle sessions.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，张百发在批斗万里的大会上被揪去作为陪斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Zhang Bafa was forced to be a 'secondary target' at a struggle session against Wan Li.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，李瑞环在批斗万里的大会上被揪去作为陪斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Li Ruihuan was forced to be a 'secondary target' at a struggle session against Wan Li.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，时传祥在批斗万里的大会上被揪去作为陪斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Shi Chuanxiang was forced to be a 'secondary target' at a struggle session against Wan Li.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家建设委员会

description.zh-cn: 张百发曾历任国家建委副局长、副主任。
description.en: Zhang Bafa successively served as Deputy Director and Vice Minister of the State Construction Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张百发于1983年3月至1997年9月期间担任北京市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Zhang Bafa served as Vice Mayor of the Beijing Municipal People's Government from March 1983 to September 1997.

description.zh-cn: 张百发在49岁时进入中国人民大学函授学院学习并获得文凭。
description.en: At the age of 49, Zhang Bafa enrolled in the correspondence school of Renmin University of China and obtained a diploma.

position.zh-cn: 北京亚运工程总指挥、亚运会组委会常务副主席

description.zh-cn: 张百发担任北京亚运工程总指挥，指挥建设了1990年北京亚运会的比赛场馆及亚运村，对亚运会的成功举办起到了关键作用。
description.en: Zhang Bafa served as the commander-in-chief of the Beijing Asian Games projects, directing the construction of the venues and the Asian Games Village, playing a crucial role in the successful hosting of the event.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，发达国家的制裁及外资撤退给1990年北京亚运会的筹备工作带来了很大困难。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989, sanctions from developed countries and the withdrawal of foreign investment caused significant difficulties for the preparations of the 1990 Beijing Asian Games.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平曾于1958年接见青年突击队长张百发。1990年和1993年，张百发两次陪同邓小平视察北京的城市建设。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping met with youth shock brigade leader Zhang Bafa in 1958. In 1990 and 1993, Zhang Bafa accompanied Deng Xiaoping on two inspections of Beijing's urban construction.

description.zh-cn: 在处理拆迁户上访事件时，时任北京市长的陈希同指示副市长张百发出面解决问题。
description.en: When dealing with a petition from displaced residents, then-Mayor of Beijing Chen Xitong instructed Vice Mayor Zhang Bafa to resolve the issue.

description.zh-cn: 王淑兰是张百发的妻子。
description.en: Wang Shulan is Zhang Bafa's wife.

description.zh-cn: 张百发与李瑞环同为青年突击队长出身，在工作中接触很多，曾一同被提拔，并在文革期间一同被陪斗，之后还曾一同探望万里。
description.en: Zhang Bafa and Li Ruihuan both started as youth shock brigade leaders, had extensive contact through their work, were promoted together, were forced to be 'secondary targets' together during the Cultural Revolution, and later visited Wan Li together.
